privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Wili ("we", "us") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our service.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.body: We collect your basic profile information from Yandex ID during authentication: display name, email, and avatar URL. We also store the wishlists and items you create.

use.title: How We Use Information
use.body: We use your information to provide and improve the wishlist service, personalize your experience, and maintain account security.

share.title: Data Sharing
share.body: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with service providers strictly to operate the service, and only as necessary.

security.title: Security
security.body: We take reasonable measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

choices.title: Your Choices
choices.body: You can update your profile information in the app. If you wish to delete your account and associated data, please contact us.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please open an issue on our GitHub repository.
